DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the attenuation of ischemic-reperfusion injury in the liver after sevoflurane preconditioning. In the presence of sevoflurane, an attenuation of liver injury is hypothesized (diminished increase of liver enzymes, reduced production of inflammatory mediators).
DOC.brief_title: Role of Volatile Anesthetics for Hepatic Protection
DOC.detailed_description: Organ protection; preconditioning; volatile anesthetics; ischemia reperfusion
DOC.criteria: Older than 18 years of age Patients undergoing liver resection (benign or malignant tumors) Laparoscopic liver resection coagulopathy (platelets < 50,000/ml, Quick < 50%) Liver cirrhosis
DOC.keyword: Surgery with Pringle maneuver needed for liver resection
